member.name: T:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.CarvingEnchantment
member.summary: Attacks on-hit reduce enemy defense by 1 point (continuing below zero). Armored enemies (i.e., Armored Bugs and shelled Rock Crabs) lose their armor when their defense is reduced to zero.

member.name: T:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.ChillingEnchantment
member.summary: Progressively chill enemies on hit for 2 seconds, freezing after stacking 3 times.

member.name: T:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.CleavingEnchantment
member.summary: Attacks on-hit spread 60% - 20% (based on distance) of the damage to other enemies within 3 tiles.

member.name: T:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.EnergizedMeleeEnchantment
member.summary: Moving and attacking generates energy, up to 100 stacks. At maximum stacks, the next attack causes a powerful electric discharge which deals heavy damage in a large area.
member.remarks: 4 charges per hit + 1 charge per 3 tiles traveled.

member.name: F:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.EnergizedMeleeEnchantment.MaxEnergy
member.summary: The amount of energy stacks when fully charged.

member.name: M:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.EnergizedMeleeEnchantment.Finalize
member.summary: Finalizes an instance of the class.

member.name: P:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.EnergizedMeleeEnchantment.Energy
member.summary: Gets or sets the current number of energy stacks.

member.name: M:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.EnergizedMeleeEnchantment.Update(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Updates the instance state.
member.param: The number of ticks elapsed since the game started, including the current tick.

member.name: T:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.EnergizedSlingshotEnchantment
member.summary: Moving and attacking generates energy, up to 100 stacks. At maximum stacks, the next shot carries an electric charge, which discharges dealing area heavy damage when it hits an enemy.
member.remarks: 6 charges per hit + 1 charge per 3 tiles traveled.

member.name: F:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.EnergizedSlingshotEnchantment.MaxEnergy
member.summary: The amount of energy stacks when fully charged.

member.name: M:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.EnergizedSlingshotEnchantment.Finalize
member.summary: Finalizes an instance of the class.

member.name: P:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.EnergizedSlingshotEnchantment.Energy
member.summary: Gets or sets the current number of energy stacks.

member.name: M:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.EnergizedSlingshotEnchantment.Update(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Updates the instance state.
member.param: The number of ticks elapsed since the game started, including the current tick.

member.name: T:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.ExplosiveEnchantment
member.summary: Absorbs and stores energy from enemy hits (before mitigation). The next special move releases twice the accumulated energy as an explosion.

member.name: F:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.ExplosiveEnchantment.MaxAccumulation
member.summary: The highest amount of damage that can be accumulated.

member.name: F:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.ExplosiveEnchantment.AccumulationStep
member.summary: The amount of damage accumulation required to increase the explosion radius by 1 tile.

member.name: M:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.ExplosiveEnchantment.Finalize
member.summary: Finalizes an instance of the class.

member.name: P:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.ExplosiveEnchantment.MaxRadius
member.summary: Gets the largest possible explosion radius.

member.name: P:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.ExplosiveEnchantment.Accumulated
member.summary: Gets or sets the total accumulated damage.

member.name: P:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.ExplosiveEnchantment.ExplosionRadius
member.summary: Gets the current radius of the would-be explosion.

member.name: M:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.ExplosiveEnchantment.Update
member.summary: Updates the instance state.

member.name: M:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.ExplosiveEnchantment.Explode(StardewValley.Tools.MeleeWeapon)
member.summary: Release stored energy.
member.param: The with this enchantment.

member.name: T:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.MammoniteEnchantment
member.summary: Attacks that would leave an enemy below 10% max health immediately execute the enemy, converting the remaining health into gold. Consecutive takedowns without taking damage increase the health threshold by 1%.

member.name: T:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.QuincyEnchantment
member.summary: Fire an energy projectile when ammunition is not equipped. The projectile is stronger the lower the firer's HP.
member.remarks: The quincy projectile has zero knockback and cannot crit, but scales in size and damage with Desperado's overcharge.

member.name: T:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.RunaanEnchantment
member.summary: Summons 2 "echoes" of the fired projectile. The echoes automatically aim at the nearest enemy after a short delay.

member.name: T:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.StabbingEnchantment
member.summary: Replaces the defensive parry special move with a stabbing lunge attack.

member.name: T:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.SteadfastEnchantment
member.summary: Cannot crit. Converts critical strike chance and power into raw damage.

member.name: T:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.SunburstEnchantment
member.summary: Attacks fire a short-range beam of solar energy. Prevents mummies from resurrecting.

member.name: T:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.VampiricEnchantment
member.summary: Attacks on-hit heal for 10% of damage dealt. Excess healing is converted into a shield for up to 20% of (the player's) max health, which slowly decays after not dealing or taking damage for 15s.

member.name: T:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.Enchantments.WabbajackEnchantment
member.summary: Causes random unpredictable effects.

member.name: M:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.SoundBox.PlayLocal(StardewValley.GameLocation,System.Nullable{Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector2},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Play a game sound for the local player.
member.param: The location in which the sound is playing, if applicable.
The tile position from which the sound is playing, or if it's playing throughout the location. Ignored in location is .
The pitch modifier to apply, or for the default pitch.

member.name: M:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.SoundBox.PlayAll(StardewValley.GameLocation,System.Nullable{Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector2},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Play a game sound for all players who can hear it.
member.param: The location in which the sound is playing.
The tile position from which the sound is playing, or null if it's playing throughout the location.
The pitch modifier to apply, or null for the default pitch.

member.name: M:DaLion.Enchantments.Framework.SoundBox.PlayAfterDelay(System.Int32,StardewValley.GameLocation,System.Nullable{Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector2},System.Int32)
member.summary: Plays the corresponding after the specified delay.
member.param: The desired delay, in milliseconds.
The location in which the sound is playing, if applicable.
The tile position from which the sound is playing, or if it's playing throughout the location.
The pitch modifier to apply, or -1 for the default pitch.

member.name: M:DaLion.Enchantments.IEnchantmentsApi.CreateQuincyProjectile(StardewValley.Farmer,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector2,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of .
member.param: The who fired this projectile.
The projectile's starting position.
The projectile's starting velocity in the horizontal direction.
The projectile's starting velocity in the vertical direction.
The projectile's starting rotational velocity.
The projectile's starting scale.
member.returns: The amount of income tax due in gold, along with total income, business expenses, eligible deductions and total taxable amount (in that order).

member.name: M:DaLion.Enchantments.I18n.GetByKey(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Get a translation by its key.
member.param: The translation key.
An object containing token key/value pairs. This can be an anonymous object (like new { value = 42, name = "Cranberries" }), a dictionary, or a class instance.

member.name: T:NetEscapades.EnumGenerators.EnumExtensionsAttribute
member.summary: Add to enums to indicate that extension methods should be generated for the type

member.name: P:NetEscapades.EnumGenerators.EnumExtensionsAttribute.ExtensionClassNamespace
member.summary: The namespace to generate the extension class. If not provided the namespace of the enum will be used

member.name: P:NetEscapades.EnumGenerators.EnumExtensionsAttribute.ExtensionClassName
member.summary: The name to use for the extension class. If not provided, the enum name with "Extensions" will be used. For example for an Enum called StatusCodes, the default name will be StatusCodesExtensions
